name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Java Engineer with 8 years of full-stack development experience. Proficient in **Java**, **Spring Boot**, and **Micronaut** for building powerful backend services, with hands-on expertise in both **MySQL** and **MariaDB** for robust database management. Skilled in implementing secure RESTful APIs and leveraging **Swagger** and **OpenAPI** for documentation and integration. Strong grasp of **JUnit** and **Mockito** for comprehensive software testing, ensuring high-quality and reliable code. Well-versed in **Kanban** and **SCRUM** methodologies for effective project management and team collaboration.

In addition to my Java proficiency, I have a solid foundation in modern web technologies, including **React**, **Node.js**, and **Python**, allowing me to engage with full-stack projects effectively. My background includes developing solutions for the healthcare and financial sectors with a focus on deploying enterprise-grade platforms under compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Notable experience in cloud solutions with **AWS** and **Azure**, alongside advanced architectural knowledge in microservices, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation.
